website_summaries.verdict: Compares to more expensive brands in style and quality, but comes at an unbeatable value. The best deal on the market today.
pros: Similar in style and quality to costly aviators at a fraction of the price
Combines lightweight arms and skin-protecting nose pads for added comfort
cons: They run slightly small and only come in 5 colors, but you might not mind, considering the price

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: They are okay. Seems pretty good quality for the price. My only complaint is that they are super reflective and too big for my small face. It's hard for me to find sunglasses that aren't too big so that is common for me. They fit my head fine, just the lens themselves are bigger than I like. You can't seem eyes through my lens like some reported. I ordered the pink ones. Nice packaging and arrived in two days with my prime membership.
customer_reviews.author: SpedAisd

customer_reviews.title: Tijuana and the watermelon
customer_reviews.text: After looking like Maverick from "Top Gun", I had many people buy me drinks. Approximately, 48 hours later I woke up in Tijuana with three women, a watermelon, and the sunglasses still on my face. Buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: At list price of $58, these are truly impressive. At sale price of $17 with free shipping, the deal is unbelievable! For those of you who have purchased Apple products, you know how slick they are, starting with the box they come in. Same here. Beautiful, well fitted box with quality materials. Top quality zippered case with soft cloth bag to prevent scratches. Oh, and then there is the actual product. Fabulous, aviator style, lightweight frames and clear, distortion-free lenses. I am a pilot. Most sunglasses marketed to pilots are $150-250 and more. These are every bit as good with polarized UV blocking lenses. A deal at $58. A steal at $17!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W.

customer_reviews.title: These glasses fit great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These glasses fit great right out of the box. Great clarity and comfort. I would recommend these especially for the price I paid. They also come with a very nice case for protection!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Perfect for driving and they look great! Not heavy, really flexible and the travel case lets me take a couple pairs when I'm on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Markus W.

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased to get this in the mail
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased to get this in the mail. It has a super nice box it came in along with a case and special cloth to clean the lenses. I got it as a Christmas gift but I might just have to order another pair for me!
customer_reviews.author: spazz

customer_reviews.title: Second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately broke my first pair. I had thrown them in my pocket when I got to work one day so they were sat on, crushed, and probably hit a couple of times from some of my equipment. The lens DID NOT break or get scratched however; one of the arms got super bent from the stress of being in my backpocket for over 8 overs. Anyway, these sunglasses have held up extremely well. I have taken them on several camping/road trips and have treated me well. If I end up breaking my newest set, I'll just buy a new color again.
customer_reviews.author: DRTYSpaceMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are awsome highly recommended for people that's thing of getting them go get them
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Solid cheap aviators.
customer_reviews.text: Aviators are my go to for cheap sunglasses...theyre bendable so they don't break easy, and the lenses typicly pop right back in if they fall out. These are solid cheap aviators. I just wish theyd take all that money on the fancy case and accessories and invest it into the glasses bc one thing I'm not doing with 6 dollar glasses is making sure they're wiped down and in their case. Edit: this appear to be 12 dollars now. I'd still buy them at that price and I plan to once mine are no more. But a couple months later they're still here.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: very attractive glasses
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, fit my big head well, dark tint, great hard case also comes with soft case and wipe cloth, UV 400 protection AND POLARIZED for this price, awesome deal, super happy. My first pair of Aviator frames, I usually get plastic Oakley frames.
customer_reviews.author: H.H.

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful, especially for the extraordinary sunlight we get here ...
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful, especially for the extraordinary sunlight we get here in Colorado. I have bilateral eye surgery to remove cataracts so they are very helpful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sichterman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses! Reduce the glare as well as my prescription Ray Ban sunglasses, which I no longer need. Fit extremely well. I have a second pair on back order, thinking if I didn't like them I could always return. Obviously, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, look expensive, very comfortable and lightweight, the size of the glasses was so small for my big face but I gave it to my mom and she loves it too. Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Stylistic and backed by a decent company
customer_reviews.text: 10/16/2017 UPDATE: I have to say that the customer service from LUENX is top notch. As I said, the pair of glasses that I received from the first one broke, but I got a replacement and I get to wear these glasses for another season. I'll update again if anything changes with these glasses, but I'm going to give the five star review for the company. Previous Review: I liked the style and they were light weight. Unfortunately these sunglasses aren't very durable. The rim broke after about 2 and a half months of moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but good aviators overall!
customer_reviews.text: Was guided to buy these based on the people saying that they have wider faces and whatnot, so I took the plunge and got them. They look great and come with a cloth for cleaning and a sleek case, though they seem smaller than talked up to be. The arms of the glasses are somewhat short also, so it can be a pain to keep them on your head when you move them from your eyes to your headline. Nonetheless, an overall great pair of aviators for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Emery

customer_reviews.title: Glasses were packaged nicely and everything was well organized throughout the process of ...
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were packaged nicely and everything was well organized throughout the process of purchasing. While this fact won't help you see any better, it told me that everything this company does is well planned and executed. I like the style of the glasses and the way they fit on the bridge of my nose....no irritation of the skin. The case and accessories were a plus. Finally, the price was very competitive as well !
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive shades.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. They are lightweight and comfortable. They have a nice shape, the clarity is good. They also feel a little more like athletic sunglasses in the way that the arms grip your head. They won't fall off. These are the best inexpensive aviator style shades that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Culper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, sturdy, and affordable with all the accessories!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th or 5th pair of LUENX sunglasses I have purchased (not because they have broken, but I have lost a couple pairs to the bottom of the lake and I left one in a rental car in New Orleans :( These glasses look good on men or women, are sturdy and resist scratches, and come with a hard zippered case, a soft drawstring bag, and a lens cleaning cloth for fingerprints. Sure, I could spend 10x’s as much on an identical pair of Ray Bans, but why? I’m now back on the site to buy some for my twin teenage daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren RN BSN CEN

customer_reviews.title: Some great glasses. Read some a lot of good reviews
customer_reviews.text: Some great glasses. Read some a lot of good reviews, so I decided to give them a try. The green tinted glasses or awesome. The tint is there but its a perfect blend. Think about it, Wally world has some aviators for $24 dollars. These are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They fit great, rthey're not made cheaply. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Reno

customer_reviews.title: Great pair at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses come with a soft cloth pouch, a hard case, and a cleaning cloth all for under $20. From a distance, they look like any other expensive aviator sunglasses. They're lightweight. They feel good on my face and offer adequate protection. They seem a bit flimsy, but I do think they seem also seem durable enough to last a good while. Definitely worth the price and definitely recommend. I love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Just say no.
customer_reviews.text: You would just be better off going to a gas station or Walmart and getting a pair, these are extremely poor quality, the arm broke the first time my husband wore them. They're flimsy, and it just wasn't my most thought through purchase, don't be like me. Don't buy these. Blenders is a great sunglasses company that have extremely cheap, amazing quality glasses if your looking for cheap, nice glasses.
customer_reviews.author: SKester

customer_reviews.title: RayBan’s WHO????? These are the S*#%!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All is have to say is... RayBan MF WHO????? These shade are AMAZING.. I’m Promise to buy every pair, even then color I don’t favor too much just bc of the high quality, superior IG protection and amazing glove type fit for my KINDA big head (no adjusting, bending the frames myself) Such a treat to see in the mail, then when trying them on was even better... If I could be a brand ambassador,... y’all get the point 💁🏾‍♂️😜💯❤️
customer_reviews.author: Von Jc

customer_reviews.title: I love these sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sun glasses! I've always preferred the look and style of aviators, however it's pretty difficult for me to come by a pair that fits my face well and looks good without spending a ton of money on the big brand sun glasses. So I sort of went out on a limb and purchased them when they were on sale, hoping they'd fit me well and not look ridiculous. When I received them, I was more than satisfied! Speedy shipping, great packaging, and came with a high quality hard case and an additional soft case. They fit wonderfully and I look great in them. And I only paid $14.00! Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality sunglasses at a fraction of the price of name brand
customer_reviews.text: My husband loses sunglasses fairly often. I used to buy him name brand glasses, and they would end up in the back of a cab, left behind at a restaurat or lost in the abyss. After his most recent loss of a new pair of ray bans, I bought him these. He loved them - they look great on, and he claims they are of comparable quality to the name brand versions. Win-Win!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses,great price.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a pair of Luenx sunglasses last year. While on a trip, I mistakenly left them in the rental car. I love these sunglasses, that's why I reordered two pair. They are light and the polarized lens are a big benefit while driving. I also love the aviator style. If your thinking of purchasing these glasses, be sure to order the correct size for your head.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly shocked with these. The hard case is high quality. The texture is tough but soothing to touch. The zipper functions flawlessly. Inside the hard case is a place to store the cleaning cloth and maybe something more. It also has a strap in the case to hold the glasses in place. The soft case might have been the biggest shock to me. It is a felt type of fabric, very nice! The cleaning cloth is the standard size and material I found anywhere else. Everything was well packaged. If these were bought in a brick and mortar store I would expect the price to be $50+ easily.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Graffeo

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like These
customer_reviews.text: These are so well packaged. I think this is my 5th or 6th pair that I have purchased. I find that these don't scratch as easily as other sunglasses I have purchased. Maybe it is be wise they provide you with a case and a bag, so I protect these better than those otbers. Some colors seem to work better than others for sun protection. I find that I squint less when I am using certain colors over others (I have very sensitive blue eyes). Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase and recommend them to others when asked.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Coating came off
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Customer service reached out to me after my review and sent me a new pair free of charge. I am very satisfied with their willingness to make their customer happy. Glasses on the left had the coating come off, glasses on the right are the replacement. These glasses were fantastic for the first few weeks. Then l noticed the coating started coming off. It may have been rubbed off from being in the 'protective case' or just a bad batch, but they now block zero sun and look worn.
customer_reviews.author: s64austin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glasses, that are very broad and seem to only fit a oversized mr. potatoe head
customer_reviews.text: Like I said before bought a pair for some back ups for road trips and stuff, came with a case and micro fiber rag, that was the only items I liked. The sunglasses themselves were ridiculous I couldn't see them fitting anyone correctly and on my face they would always tilt, very cheap dropped them and they broke from just getting out of my car when they were on my lap. Like I said the case is worth it, I use the case for my oakleys and ray bans now!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, good price - green is a little darker than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses at a great price - purchased for my daughter as a gift. They come nicely packaged with a great set of cases on cleaning cloth. The feel heavier than most inexpensive glasses and the hinges are nice and tight. They are a green, but a very dark green. We were hoping for a little bit lighter green similar to the original high altitude aviators but for the price my daughter is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: FrankS

customer_reviews.title: Is it men’s or women’s sizing?  Who knows.
customer_reviews.text: Product says it is for men, but sized for women I believe. Too small, super lightweight. Very cheaply made. Gave them away. Get what you pay for. Update - seller reached out to offer replacement of better fitting sunglasses. Great customer service, therefore rating change. Looking forward to trying a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Junk, not worth $16
customer_reviews.text: Very poor build quality, glasses rattle, and they are very undersized for aviators. They would fit well on a child or a very small person, but not a full sized adult. Quality of the polarization is also very sketchy. You can find far better sunglasses for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Story

customer_reviews.title: stylish and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband but find myself constantly wearing this. It's very stylish. The lens is not made of glass but I like it that way because that makes it very lightweight. Great everyday/driving glasses. The visuals are crispy and colorful on sunny days, and they keep my eyes comfortable and cool. Great buy, loved the packaging too! Very fancy! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mahisha

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Glasses picked in nice bag,look good,fit well,but lens fell out the third time I wore them, replaced fell out again Wasted my money,.Would not buy again and certainly do not recommend.After my review they sent me a replacement pair at no cost. this pair is fine . I have had no problems with them . Based on the replacement pair I would rate a four and resend my no buy statement
customer_reviews.author: ltejas

customer_reviews.title: (5 Star) Just as shown and specified
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses. Frame is light weight and large. They look dark, but looking through them you do get a true color view. Came packaged just as specifications state. I tested and they are polarized, I really like the noes pieces and would buy again. I just wish they had the green lenses when I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Bad A**
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses - this is probably the third year that I've purchased several sets for the summer. Considering the price, you just can't go wrong with these bad boys. They look sharp, give great protection from UV, and the mirror diversions work excellent! Five-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D.

customer_reviews.title: Much too light in weight
customer_reviews.text: These are very, very light glasses. It took less that week for me to loss them. I slipped them in the neck of my shirt and they disappeared. I have no recollection of them falling out they are so light After, writing the above review the seller wrote to me offering to replace my lost glasses for free which I accepted. I'm now using the glasses which I like a great deal but I am much more careful of them. I return them to their case when I'm not using them or I hold them when I take them off for a "second". GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: raymond stanton

customer_reviews.title: Thin Framework leads to easy bending
customer_reviews.text: These came with all the accessories mentioned, but the frame was so thin that I was afraid a strong wind would have broken them. I ended up accidentally bending them not too long after I got them. Update: The company contacted me about these and replaced them with a more durable frame. I'm very appreciative, and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Grant

customer_reviews.title: NICE GLASSES GREAT CASE
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these inexpensive sunglasses because I always lose them. To my surprise, the hard zippered case with a belt-loop that comes with these is worth more than they are asking for the whole package. I came back and bought more just for the case, the glasses are and added bonus. Great deal!!! Thank you LUENX!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois & Billy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Stylish, Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my fourth pair of LUENX sunglasses, I LOVE them! The design is great- stylish, cool, simple. They're comfortable to wear, not too loose, not too tight, never need to push them up the bridge of my nose (I forget I'm wearing them half the time). Plus they're very well made and only half the price of comparable shades! They even come with a nice hard case, a cloth case, and a cloth wipe, all of great quality. In the four pairs I've owned, I haven't had a single complaint with these sunglasses. I highly recommend LUENX!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Although it has been too overcast, since this products arrival, to put them to use ... From all appearances, they appear very well made. The case seems decent enough and the cleaning cloth is of very high caliber. Since I have not been able to use, in heavy sun and glare, I am simply making the assumption that they will work well. They appear to be well constructed, very comfortable to wear, and ... at this point of inspection, VERY (special emphasis added) well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lanya LaPunta

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these pretty much because they were an inexpensive daily special and I needed some 'filler' gifts. I didn't expect very much but I was pleasantly surprised. The box they came in was sleek and sturdy. Upon opening I found a cleaning cloth and a bag to keep them in that were of same quality as high priced brands. The sunglasses themselves were in a hard shell zippered case that is durable. The glasses are lightweight and appear to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting off getting new sunglasses for quite some time! I came across these on Amazon and OMG they are fantastic! They were packaged very well. I received a case for carrying them, as well as a soft string drawn case to put them in for an extra layer of protection before I put them in the zippered case that I got with the purchase. I also received a cleaning cloth. Run, don't walk and get you a pair! You won't regret it! I have also received many compliments as well!
customer_reviews.author: simplyme72

customer_reviews.title: Great classic aviators buy these now !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing classic light weight aviators I say light weight only due to you can hardly feel that they are on --these are very well made and have amazing little details --you will not be disappointed they send you a beautiful hard black case to keep them safe and a nice cleaning cloth to keep the lens clear---luenx my only wish is please please make a gradient lens color-thank u luenx for a great pair of aviators
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Recommended -- you get a great value for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the black and mirrored sunglasses for my husband. He loves them. Lightweight, comfortable,and well made. Plus, each came with a zippered, hard case, soft cleaning cloth, and cloth storage bag. Great price, great item. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: third pair purchase was a fail
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these exact glasses for the third time this Fall. The first two were great and my only downfall was that they scratched very easy so I would replace them sooner than other glasses. The last pair is different, maybe manufactured in a different place or something. They constantly look smudgey and dull unlike the first time even after vigorously cleaning and the lenses continually fall out of them, the first two never had lens issues. Would be interested to know why things changed but I would not buy them again after this last pair,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of glasses woth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: These are a super buy for the cost. I have a pair of $ 130.00 Aviator Polarized glasses that I have had for about 5 years and these glasses look like they were made by the same company. I am not saying they were but they are that much of a look alike. Very nice set with a cleaning cloth, Hard glass Case, and soft case as well. They fit well and look good, I would expect they would make a nice gift as well. I would not hesitate recommending them to anyone. Thousands of books read
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: Light and Clear
customer_reviews.text: Four stars only since I've had them so briefly--they may merit five later. Vision is very good, clear polarized lenses give a crisp view; the large lens gives maximum protection; and they wear lightly on the nose (many with such large lenses become uncomfortable after an hour). After a week, no problems, very happy with performance. Here's hoping durability will be as good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B

customer_reviews.title: good glasses for a good price
customer_reviews.text: i appreciate all the extras that go into this with the hard shell case, soft cloth bag and cloth cleaner. glasses look good on and off your face. i had a pair before but one of my friends sat on them and bent the frame badly. but the glasses themselves stayed in place and only had a minor scratch. my only thing is it's a little snug on my face but that's probably a ME thing and not on the glasses. i got the silver frames.
customer_reviews.author: Thad Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Issue, but immediately resolved. Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: August 10. Seller contacted me and immediately offered a gratis replacement. A++ customer service. New glasses arrived and are great! Initially these sunglasses were great. Look and fit very well. After less than two months of minimal wearing and general caution when wearing the outer reflective coating has begun to come off. I will need to replace these very soon. Granted, these are on the cheaper end of things...that being said, I've had much cheaper mirrored sunglasses last much longer than these. Generally disappointed and wish I was within my return window.
customer_reviews.author: cf351497

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the black, gray, and then made a third purchase of the brown. All came in a nice case with a sack and cleaning cloth. Can't beat the price and the quality is above average. Lightweight and easy on the sinuses. I won't buy a mirror lens again, but; the regular lenses are perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Stop squinting. Get these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: So happy that I found these glasses on Amazon. Great price. Very stylish. Love the UV protection. Really nice that it came with a zipped case, a cloth satchel, cleaning cloth. Nicely boxed. I think I’ll be giving these out as gifts to a few friends and family this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Zucker

customer_reviews.title: and I have discovered the best pair that I own
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of sunglasses, from RayBans to Oakleys to L.L.Beans to this cheap LUNEX one. Just completed a 2500 mile drive wearing these sunglassess, and I have discovered the best pair that I own. Amazing clarity, amazing filtering. Not for a moment during daytime driving I had to take off my sunglasses because it was too dark outside. I even drove through several tunnels wearing these glasses, and it felt like the glasses adjusted to the surrounding. I am going to order another pair today.
customer_reviews.author: Kit_Walker

customer_reviews.title: Most durable sunglasses ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses so much and even though I don’t need a pair bc they never wear out I ordered them anyway so in case I lost them. They never get loose at hinges and I’ve had them years and years. Never had sunglasses this durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. wilson

customer_reviews.title: These aviators are pretty good - they have a lot of extra stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: These aviators are pretty good - they have a lot of extra stuff to make your life easier as well. They're fairly light, the case is nice, there is a protective sleeve, cleaning cloth, carrying case - all kinds of extras. The nose pieces are comfortable... but the entire frame, lenses, and nose piece are made in a way that leaves a huge gap between your eyes and the actual lenses of the glasses. So if you like wearing glasses AND squinting a whole lot - these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: DropTheDie

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are certainly a good deal. I bought them during a lightning deal for less than 15 bucks. I have two pairs now, a fact that I'll explain. the first pair I ordered, with dark green lenses, did not seem to filter out the light rays, almost as though they weren't polarized. The seller sent me a replacement pair for free, with blue mirrored lenses. This second pair, with mirrored blue lenses, works much better, and I wholeheartedly recommend getting these with the mirror lenses.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Package was amazing, making product look much more expensive. Then you get to the actual sunglasses. They're flimsy and feel cheap. I was looking for a cheap pair of glasses for someone who breaks/loses his every other week, so it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Because my previous silver one lost during flight transit after 2-3 yrs' use, this is the second (or third?) time I bought this sunglasses. Currently I had this model and the brown one. They both are excellent. This silver reflection shade is darker, I use it for sunny day. The brown color shade is lighter, I wear for cloudy weather. They work perfectly so far. And given the fact sunglasses are consumables (lost, damage, etc.), their price make them easy to be replaced without hurting your wallet too much. Highly recommend. Pros: Style. Light weight. Low price. Cons: Bulky case. Could have provided a thinner and leather one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of these glasses not to mention the nice soft and hard case and cleaning cloth added to the value of these glasses. They are nice looking and comfortable. I drive into the sun on the way to work and into the sun on the way home and these have made the last few days much easier to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacleanin

customer_reviews.title: She's happy...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the wife after she lost her second pair of RayBans. She loves them and the price was right. Unless someone is on top of you they will never know you not wearing expensive shades. She says that while they are not RB's she is more than happy with them. I am too so now when she looses these it won't break the bank to replace them. I rely on Amazon reviews, please post on the stuff you buy.
customer_reviews.author: GarnetGull77

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Fits Well!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly the best value and quality of sunglasses, I've gotten multiple pairs because I also have a tendancy to forget my sunglasses everywhere. They are great for protecting the eyes and very light that it doesn't hurt the bridge of my nose like some heavier designs.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Received these glasses within a few days of my order. These glasses were better than expected. Decent quality and come with a nice case, protective pouch and lens cleaning cloth. Bought these for use on my motorcycle and passed the test on my first ride. Purchased the solid black lenses and they are very dark. Not a problem for what I am using them for, but some people may want less tint. For the price you can’t beat these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: WillyWilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of Sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get another Aviator sunglasses. Some how, my other pair got lost or forgotten and I found it hard to drive without them. Now my wife wants a pair. I don't know if you make these sunglasses or contract them out, but they are the nicest I've had since I was in the 82nd Airborne Division, U.S. Army.
customer_reviews.author: jlwmdd

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Quality Sunglasses at Super Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: What a sharp looking p[air of sunglasses. It was packed so nicely inside a great looking box; the case is quality, and includes an extra soft, draw string bag, the cloth you use to clean the glasses, and a medal hook that can attach the case to something. I wore them out today and someone young enough to be my granddaughter complimented me on how stylish I looked in my sunglasses. I'll take it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats ANY name brand glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is my forth purchase of these glasses. I have a couple of pairs for myself and buying a couple for my army friends. These glasses are simply spectacular. They are well built and of superior quality. I would easily pay $50 for these. I've paid more than $300 a pair and these glasses blow them out of the water. Thank you for making these available for such an exceptional price
customer_reviews.author: SBugati

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Great value and look for the price. The quality of product was nicer then expected. Why pay $150+ for Ray Bans (they are super nice OK) because you can still break or loose them. WHY when you can get close great looks and sturdy construction. Was also impressed with comfort
customer_reviews.author: Nicelyhonest

customer_reviews.title: you'll look good!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a stylish way to drive to the store, cross the country, or just cross a crosswalk, then these are the glasses for you! Tired of sunglasses making you look like a tool or a jock. Then get these glasses. They are the bomb digity. I love em'! Also, I have ordered a few pairs of these since I can be hard on glasses working in construction. In my last order they sent me a coupon for a free pair! Love the Luenx seller.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Green lens aviators
customer_reviews.text: These were $20. But they feel flimsy. They cast a iridescence on anything with a reflection from the sun. Think oncoming traffics windshields etc. makes it hard to concentrate on driving.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses polarized by Luenx
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these glasses. He says they are darker than any he has had but still able to see other things. They are not heavy on the nose or ears. The case and bag keeps the clean and safe for the next use.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs of these pretty much because they were an inexpensive daily special and I needed some 'filler' gifts. I didn't expect very much but I was pleasantly surprised. The box they came in was sleek and sturdy. Upon opening I found a cleaning cloth and a bag to keep them in that were of same quality as high priced brands. The sunglasses themselves were in a hard shell zippered case that is durable. The glasses are lightweight and appear to be of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Top Gun... Less Douchebag
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... these glasses came with everything promised and feel really sturdy. The high point for them is that they do not not ha e the douchebag feel most aviators have. I can't explain it but if you've owned aviators before, you know there are some pair you put on and instantly feel like a douchebag... these ain't them... I also wear contacts and have no problem vision wise. If you're looking for a really good pair sunglass for a great price i'd highly recommend them... and I hardly ever give five stars so if you give them freely you may consider these 5 star worthy...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t rate these because the frames are so thin. I think it’s been at least 8 months now, so they deserve a review They have been through hell and back. I destroyed the case so they have been in my pocket, computer bag etc. no real scratches- and I’ll wear them again tomorrow No springs in the bows but they take the wear and tear. I will buy a couple more for $12 a pop now that I’ve put these to the test
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sun glasses. I have a pair of Ray Ban Aviators and these look almost just like them. They are lighter than Ray Bans but fit and look just the same. Polorization is nice too. I always worry about my Ray Bans getting lost or crushed because they aren't inexpensive but for the money these are a great stand in that I'd never worry about at all because they are a fraction of the price. They come in a very nice case but I'll probably never use that. I bought the second one from the left. It says Green on Amazon but gun metal on the order and I'll definately buy them again Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: gdiman

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are an amazing value. They are polarized
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are an amazing value. They are polarized, come in a nice case and are lightweight. I bought them for my husband, who keeps losing sunglasses, because I wanted him to have a nice pair but didn't want to spend a lot on something I will probably have to replace again in less than a year. These sunglasses were just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Muggli

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dark! Super!
customer_reviews.text: These would be great for you post cataract surgery folks! Like mine very much plus pouch and case!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer sent the wrong model. EDIT: Manufacturer resolved. Good quality sunglasses overall
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer sent the wrong model. I ordered the green, but received black. Construction seems alright. Edit: The manufacturer contacted me and resolved the issue (sent another pair), and the quality of the sunglasses and packaging is good, so I'm sufficiently satisfied to increase my rating to five stars. Just be aware of the potential risk of not getting exactly what you chose.
customer_reviews.author: imahar

customer_reviews.title: Makes sound
customer_reviews.text: each time i move the glasses, it makes a sound of a loose plastic. compared to a 9 dollars glass, this one is better, I like how it looks, it's good for under 20, just the sound is so annoying to hear each time i wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star and would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like it’s light weight and it’s very comfortable and usually I’m the type that can’t have sunglasses on for 15min due to it hurts my nose or it’s just uncomfortable, however, this Luenx brand is so comfortable that sometimes I forget to take them off when I’m in the store or anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small collection of polarized sun glasses. I bought these for the case and to have to have a disposable pair of glasses, but they turned out to be my best pair so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, too back they don't last at all. [upgraded]
customer_reviews.text: Good enough looking glasses. Started noticing this (see picture) around the glasses, end of May (just 2 months after receiving them). Because of that I couldn't wear them in public, so I've been using them while driving, but now this bothers my view altogether :( oh well UPDATE : Upgraded from 1 to 3 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KaryllH

customer_reviews.title: Covers my eyes really nice and have a great look to them
customer_reviews.text: Covers my eyes really nice and have a great look to them. Very elegant and sleek. My wife liked them so much a had to buy her a pair also.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Had them for about two weeks, I hardly wore them. Plus would make sure to put back in both cases they provided when they were not being worn. I noticed little black dots started appearing on one of the lens and they don't come out. So not sure what to do. LUENX reached out to me. I greatly appreciate it! I also want to say, I had purchased two pairs of these glasses at the same time. My husband got the other pair. He said he absolutely loves his and gets compliments daily about them at work. His are in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Wifeandmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected, from others reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read quite a few bad reviews but still bought these glasses. Mine have been wonderful. They are polarized, they havent scratched easily, as others said that theirs did. I love how dark they are, as my eyes tend to be pretty sensitive to the sun. They come in a sturdy case with a cloth wipe and a sleeve, if you prefer that over the bigger case. Id buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: DLW

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I leave sunglasses behind me like a bread trail, which is why I purchase lower priced sunglasses. Pro: clear lens, no distortions - excellent fit (for me) - light weight Con: will they hold up to abuse ?, remains to be seen. (given my track record, I will loose them before I abuse them) Side note: packaging is excellent, The case is worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! They are beautiful and well made. The sun protection is great, these glasses give a really clear view. The seller is giving great service. I can highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CvL

customer_reviews.title: Classic throwback style with comfortable fit....and they're polarized!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pair of Aviators for the summer. I usually buy lightweight polycarbonate or plastic sunglasses because the metal pairs I had before we're too heavy. The LUENX polarized sunglasses are a great find. I was afraid that they would be too delicate and fragile if they are this light, but I was wrong. They look great and feel durable. I bought the green lens, but now I'm debating between the mirrored or the yellow-gold lens. Thanks, LUENX!!!
customer_reviews.author: buck

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love Luenx sunglasses. Well crafted, comfortable and with nice cases. These were a replacement for a pair just like them lost a few weeks back. I have their wayfarers too. Great value. I lose sunglasses a couple times a year so I stopped buying $100 pairs. Was buying at Target or similar for $20. Now I just buy these for $13 (in deals). Better quality for less.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have the greatest experience with this brand of sunglasses a couple years ago. However, the customer service reached out to me and told me they have upgraded the quality of product and sent me a free pair for my inconvenience from the previous time. 5/5 stars for customer service! The sunglasses are better quality than before! They seem thicker, more sturdier, and overall I really like them! They are great for the price. I would recommend them to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels well made, it keeps out the sun very well. I also own a similar pair of the expensive brand that starts with a R but they are heavier but probably stronger. But my present choice is LUENX.
customer_reviews.author: rlcamazon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The piece that rests on your nose is not symmetrical therefore they sit on your fav crooked. Useless. Poor quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Second pair, love them!
customer_reviews.text: I got a second pair of these(different styles) to have in car. Love them and they do NOT feel cheap. I love not worrying about lossing an expensive pair of sunglasses. It is no fun to do that!
customer_reviews.author: bridgitte Martin

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true? You betcha
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of fancy packaging for what look and feel like a very cheap pair of sunglasses. If the money that was put into the box, bag, and carrying case were put into the glasses themselves, I might worry less about breaking the things. Also, the logo on the lens is a cheesy and distracting annoyance. They seem to fit ok which is why I was generous with 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Beane

customer_reviews.title: come with a good amount of extras
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough for cheap sunglasses, come with a good amount of extras. Great for the price, good overall as far as sunglasses go. Ended up purchasing these because my other sunglasses are missing and presumed gone forever. I'd recommend them, just don't expect ray-ban or oakley level of detail on them.
customer_reviews.author: Pryoplasm

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like these so much that I now have bought about 10 or 11, many of which are sitting on the shelf in the closet waiting for Christmas. Excellent, well presented, well packed, well made gifts, and when they go on sale the price can’t be beat with a stick.
customer_reviews.author: Tharin

customer_reviews.title: One of The Best Value and Quality Sunglasses Available On This Site.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are both stylish and well built. I have gotten several compliments while wearing them. I am happy that I purchased and received such good quality sunglasses. The extra protective case and accessories are extra icing on the cake. I recently took these on a river trip and after hours of swimming, I can say that these are built to last. I will definitely be purchasing other styles from LUENX.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are better than expected. Lenses are a little darker than my old pair but this is not a flaw. I think the darker lenses handled the sun glare much better than my old pair. . Luenx USA followed up to make sure everything was OK. Very happy with the purchase. May consider buying another pair. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, nice looking sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair for my husband....... He loves them. They look to be good quality at a decent price. There were also a cleaning cloth and two cases included, a sturdy zippered one and a soft velvet bag. Shipping was faster than expected especially with the pandemic going on. I would order again from this company. Happy Husband, Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have Costa , Ray ban, and these are just great glasses. Bought them to take on vacation and I have the gold ones gradient brown too. These things are probably the best sunglasses for the price and you don't worry if they get stolen, drop, or break. Nice dark tint for very sunny sky.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Usavage

customer_reviews.title: I can’t express how happy we are with these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I can’t express how happy we are with these glasses! We got 3 sets for my husband, his brother and his step father, and they all love their sunglasses! They are extremely light weight, but durable, which is surprising. Came with a handy case and it keeps it safe inside the car. Just waiting a little more and I’ll get a pair for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: Gee

feature_bullets: POLARIZED LENS ▶ 100% UV400 eye protection effectively filter & block glares;Designed for driving & outdoor activities;High-definition lens gives you a natural & clear vision;Durable & Shatterproof;Weight is 65% Lighter than traditional Glass Lens.

SKIN-FRIENDLY NOSE PADS ▶ Environmental & skin-friendly materials.Adjustable;Elastic and weight-free features enables you a long-time wearing without fatigue.
